data.actual_result: You can't actually do anything with voice chat, you can't leave it, you can't turn on/off microphone and speakers.
data.expected_result: You can talk and hear using Bluetooth speakers!
data.short_description: Using bluetooth speakers breaks voice chat completely and you can't unmute/mute, deafen/undeafen, and leave the voice channel. Nor being able to hear and talk.
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect Bluetooth speakers to your phone - Join any voice chat
